plot: It's been nearly ten years since Freddy Krueger terrorized people in the dreams, and the towns folk want to keep him erased from their memory. Freddy still has one more plan on getting back to Elm Street. He resurrects Jason Voorhees and sends him off to kill. The more bodies which fall to the ground, the stronger in which Freddy becomes. This is until, Freddy realizes that Jason isn't going to step aside easily, and must be taken down himself.

m.role: Lindermann in Freddy vs. Jason, who's an all-around nice guy and adorkable.
Nice Jewish Boy: Linderman, who's an all-around nice guy and adorkable.
Papa Wolf: Lori's father does genuinely want to protect her. His secret drugging of her orange juice, lies, and general overbearing nature do a fair job of keep this from being positive, however.

f.role: The Final Girl's last name is "Campbell".

Freddy vs. Jason: Lori, (played by 5'1" Monica Keena) pulling Freddy out of the dream world, setting a dock on fire, and killing him with Jason's machete. By the end she is one of the most kickass Final Girls in either series (the hottest).

name: Freddy vs. Jason
